DOC.detailed_description: Obese child age 9-16 year King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital randomize receive instruction either low-GI diet ( intervention group ) low-calorie , low-fat diet ( control group ) . Both group followed-up every month six month . The primary outcome body composition change six-month period , measure dual X-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) bioelectrical impedance analysis ( BIA ) . Secondary outcome metabolic syndrome risk change measure fast plasma glucose , insulin , lipid profile . The adherence nutritional education physical activity recommendation evaluate use three-day dietary record ( two weekdays one weekend day ) physical activity questionnaire visit . All participant examine counseled physical activity life style modification strategy pediatrician every visit .
